Text: NYISO Board of Directors decision on the Appeal of the MC Action on Cost Allocation writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Dear Members of the ISO Committees and TIE List The NYISO Board of Directors has made its decision on the Appeal of the Management Committee Action on Cost Allocation Rules The Boards decision has been posted to the NYISO web site under the Board of Directors Page You can access the document from the following link servicesdocumentsgroupsboardofdirectorshtmlcostalloc Regards Kristen Kranz

NYISO MSWG Meeting writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Dear Market Structure WG Members The following items have been posted to the NYISO web site for the July th MSWG meeting MOU Transmission Matrix document Transaction Prescheduling Con Op Draft This material is in support of the agenda items regarding Transmission and Transaction Prescheduling Please click on the following link to view the material servicesdocumentsgroupsbicmktstructgroupmeetingmaterialshtml Regards Kristen Kranz NYISO Market Services

NYISO Weekly Update Dear Members of the MC BIC OC and TIE List Attached please find the NYISO Weekly Update This Update is written jointly by Mollie Lampi and other NYISO staff The NYISO Weekly Update provides a brief status report of or progress on a range of issues that are under discussion at NYISO Committee meetings or are being undertaken by NYISO Staff Many but not all of these issues are being addressed through the NYISO Committee structure Market participants may raise any comments or questions on items covered in the update through the Committee structure or directly to Mollie Lampi You can find prior editions of the Weekly Update on the NYISO Committees page of the NYISO web site Services Committees and Working Groups Weekly Update or by clicking on the following link servicesdocumentsgroupsweeklyupdateswklyupdateshtml See attached file weeklyPDF weeklyPDF
